name: tenantRelationships_managedTenants_UpdateCloudPcDevices
description: Update the navigation property cloudPcDevices in tenantRelationships

$ul: **@odata.type**
**id**: The unique identifier for an entity. Read-only.
**cloudPcStatus**: The status of the cloud PC. Possible values are: notProvisioned, provisioning, provisioned, upgrading, inGracePeriod, deprovisioning, failed. Required. Read-only.
**deviceSpecification**: The specification of the cloud PC device. Required. Read-only.
**displayName**: The display name  of the cloud PC device. Required. Read-only.
**lastRefreshedDateTime**: Date and time the entity was last updated in the multi-tenant management platform. Required. Read-only.
**managedDeviceId**: The managed device identifier of the cloud PC device. Optional. Read-only.
**managedDeviceName**: The managed device display name of the cloud PC device. Optional. Read-only.
**provisioningPolicyId**: The provisioning policy identifier for the cloud PC device. Required. Read-only.
**servicePlanName**: The service plan name of the cloud PC device. Required. Read-only.
**servicePlanType**: The service plan type of the cloud PC device. Required. Read-only.
**tenantDisplayName**: The display name for the managed tenant. Required. Read-only.
**tenantId**: The Azure Active Directory tenant identifier for the managed tenant. Required. Read-only.
**userPrincipalName**: The user principal name (UPN) of the user assigned to the cloud PC device. Required. Read-only.
